language.name: en
language.title: Mailing Lists
language.subtitle: getting support and information by email
language.content:
OpenAMQ Email Lists *******************
amq-announce ============
For persons who want to track the AMQ project without being involved in the development process.
This is a private list. Your subscription will be verified by the list manager before you are allowed to join.
- [http://amq.imatix.net/mailman/listinfo/amq-announce:Subscribe] - [http://amq.imatix.net/mailman/admin/amq-announce:Administration interface]
amq-dev =======
For developers involved in the AMQ project or using it in their applications.
This is a private list. Your subscription will be verified by the list manager before you are allowed to join.
- [http://amq.imatix.net/mailman/listinfo/amq-dev:Subscribe] - [http://amq.imatix.net/mailman/admin/amq-dev:Administration interface]
